mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, useracct, username, sex, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, is_deleted ) values (#{id}, #{useracct}, #{username}, #{sex}, now(), #{createBy}, NOW(), #{lastModifiedBy}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.select: select t.id, t.useracct, t.username, case t.sex when '0' then '男' else '女' end as sex, t.gmt_create, t.create_by, t.gmt_modified, t.last_modified_by, p.position, t.is_deleted from t_user t left join t_position p on t.useracct=p.useracct;
mapper.update: update t_user set is_deleted=1 where useracct='2017010437';
